name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Summary of Christmas Eve in churches around the world

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 24, at MixC in Shenzhen Science Park, a group of people protested under the Christmas tree, with slogans related to China Resources.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 25, at Wangjiangfu, Haibo, Shandong, workers gathered at the entrance of the construction site with A4 papers taped to their bodies to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 25, affected by the draft of the "Online Game Management Measures", game stocks continued to fall sharply after opening

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 24, Xi'an, Shaanxi. A blogger interviewed passers-by: Describe your 2023 in one sentence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"New weakness"
On December 25, the media reported that a community in Wuxi, Jiangsu Province, issued a notice prohibiting villagers from raising poultry. If rectification is not made, the village pension will be cancelled. It will also affect family members' party membership and political review.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 25, Caixin published a heavyweight editorial titled "Revisiting the Ideological Line of Seeking Truth from Facts", which stated: "Violating the Ideological Line of Seeking Truth from Facts will lead to the misleading of the Party and the country." "During the Cultural Revolution, the national economy was on the verge of collapse, but the authorities still insisted that 'the situation was very good and getting better and better'. In fact, people's livelihood was in decline, poverty and backwardness, not only the gap with developed countries was widening, but also being left far behind by the booming neighboring countries and regions."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 23, in the Jishishan disaster area in Linxia, a netizen posted a video asking for help, saying that Qianling Village was short of supplies and forty children were sleeping in one tent.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 24, Dalian, Liaoning. At Wal-Mart, a delivery boy accidentally touched a man's shoes while pushing a shopping cart. After the boy apologized, the man still refused to give in and asked the boy to polish his shoes, and he could not use his hands. Then both of them were taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 25, a giant cake in commemoration of the 130th anniversary of Chairman Mao's birth was placed in the cafeteria of Hunan Normal University.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 25, Shanghai Christian International Chapel
This church is located at the intersection of Hengshan Road and Urumqi South Road

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 25, the State Administration of Press and Publication suddenly released 105 game licenses. However, due to the delay in obtaining the licenses, some companies may have withdrawn their project teams, and some have even gone bankrupt....

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the article "Revisiting the ideological line of seeking truth from facts" has been deleted.
